title: Verify: Selecting PGA Tour Live successfully opens the PGA Tour Live app
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has setup their Apple TV device
AND has gone to the "App Store"
AND has added the "PGA Tour Live" app to their library
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects PGA Tour Live from the Apple TV menu
custom_expected: THEN the PGA Tour Live app will open successfully

title: Verify: PGA Tour Live can be accessed while the Apple TV is connected wirelessly
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has setup their Apple TV device
AND the Apple TV device is currently connected to a wireless network
AND PGA Tour Live is installed
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects PGA Tour Live from the Apple TV menu
custom_expected: THEN PGA Tour Live will open successfully

title: Verify: PGA Tour Live can be accessed while the Apple TV is connected using a wired connection
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has setup their Apple TV device
AND the Apple TV device is currently connected to a wired network connection
AND PGA Tour Live is installed
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects PGA Tour Live from the Apple TV menu
custom_expected: THEN the PGA Tour Live will open successfully

title: Wired Connection: Launch and playback
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have the Apple TV connected to a wired network connection
AND we have installed PGA Tour Live
AND we have accessed the Channel
custom_steps:
WHEN we locate a video feed
AND we attempt to play this
custom_expected:
THEN the video stream will launch successfully
AND the feed will play without issue

title: Wireless Connection: Launch and playback
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have the Apple TV connected to a wireless network connection
AND we have installed PGA Tour Live
AND we have accessed the Channel
custom_steps:
WHEN we locate a video feed
AND we attempt to play this
custom_expected:
THEN the video stream will launch successfully
AND the feed will play without issue

title: Launch to Fullscreen - First View
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have the Apple TV connected to a network 
AND we have installed PGA Tour Live
AND we have accessed the Channel
custom_steps:
WHEN we locate a video feed we have not yet viewed
AND we attempt to play this
custom_expected:
THEN the video playback will launch
AND the playback will be full screen

title: Video Player UI - Appearance and Timeout
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed PGA Tour Live
AND we have accessed the Channel
custom_steps:
WHEN we launch a video feed
AND we tap any button
custom_expected:
THEN the Play Controls overlay the video playback at launch
AND after 15 seconds they disappear
AND tapping any button again will repeat the appearing function
AND after 15 seconds they disappear

title: Video Player UI - Functionality
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed PGA Tour Live
AND we have accessed the Channel
custom_steps: WHEN we launch a video feed
custom_expected:
THEN the controls will function as displayed (Apple TV standard player):

Start/Pause
Swipe Down for options
Swipe Up for media info

title: Full Linear Playback to Exit
custom_preconds: GIVEN we have installed PGA Tour Live AND we have accessed the Channel
custom_steps:
WHEN we launch a video feed with a TRT > 60mins
AND watch to completion
custom_expected:
THEN playback will commence and continue without stalls or skips
AND the user will not be kicked out of the stream unexpectedly
AND upon completion the app will return to launch (asset) page

title: Seek FWD to Exit
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed PGA Tour Live
AND we have accessed the Channel
custom_steps:
WHEN we launch a video feed
AND seek to tail of program
custom_expected: THEN the app will transition from playback and return to launch (asset) page gracefully

title: Seek BACK (RWD) to Head of Program
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed PGA Tour Live
AND we have accessed the Channel
custom_steps:
WHEN we launch a video feed
AND seek FWD > 10 mins into program
AND allow > 30 secs of playback
AND seek BACK (RWD) to head of program
custom_expected: THEN the app will resume playback from beginning and continue without issue

title: VOD: A free video is able to be played by anyone
VOD: A paid video should only be played by an entitled account, all other get the upsell

title: Live: A free live feed should play to an entitled account and to an anonymous user
Live: A paid feed should only play to an entitled account, all others should get the upsell
Network: Verify bandwidth/stream quality adapts with network fluctuations
Network: Verify video quality improves with connectivity improvement
Network: Verify when throttling connection strength that bitrate playback adjusts without issue in both directions
Home: Verify when PGA Tour Live is accessed the user lands on the Home screen (first launch)
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has installed PGA Tour Live
custom_steps:
WHEN PGA Tour Live is accessed
AND user has successfully signed in
custom_expected:
THEN the user will be brought to the Home Screen
AND the Home screen should display featured assets:

+Current Tournament Content shelf
+All Tournaments
+All Videos
+Settings

AND no Continue Watching asset is listed
AND the assets are able to be scrolled through
AND the assets are selectable/playable

title: Home: Verify Top Nav Bar options when PGA Tour Live is accessed
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed PGA Tour Live
AND we have accessed the app
custom_steps: WHEN we access the main menu page
custom_expected:
THEN the following options will be listed at the top of the screen: (in the following order left to right)

This Week
Events
Subscribe
More

title: Verify Home shelves: order, text and formatting are correct, clear and readable
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed PGA Tour Live
AND we access the app
custom_steps:
WHEN we traverse the Home Screen options: (in the following order top to bottom)

+Current Tournament Content shelf
+All Tournaments
+All Videos
+Settings
custom_expected:
THEN all text will be formatted correctly
AND all thumbnails will appear without issue

title: Events: Format and Text are clear and legible
Events: Each Event has: a thumbnail, a date of when the event happened, and the events title
Events: Entering any Event will bring the user to the respective Events page
Events: If an event doesn't have any videos associated with said event then the user will see 'No Content Available' Message
Events: When the user drills down into a specific event, the user till be brought the events page with a carousel and a featured video
Events: All videos associated with each event should have media attached to it
Subscribe: Legible Format and Text
Subscribe: Tab disappears when the user restores an ITunes account or signs into a PGA account
Subscribe: Both Annual and Monthly subscriptions are clearly shown to the user
Subscribe: 7-day Free Trail is only shown for the monthly subscription
Subscribe (AppleID user Not signed in): Verify selecting the Subscribe button opens the iTunes Sign in Page
custom_preconds:
PGA Tour Live has been downloaded to ATV 
AND launched from the ATV menu
AND no PGA Tour Live user is signed in
custom_steps: Select the Subscribe button
custom_expected:
iTunes Store Sign in Screen:
(Left side screen) Virtual Keyboard
(right side) Apple ID entry field & Submit button

title: iTunes Store Sign in: Verify selecting Submit button opens the iTunes PASSWORD submission Page  - (if Apple ID user is not signed in)
custom_preconds:
PGA Tour Live has been downloaded to ATV 
AND launched from the ATV menu
AND no PGA Tour Live user is signed in
AND user has Selected Subscribe from Welcome screen
custom_steps:
1. Enter valid AppleID email
2. select "Submit"
custom_expected:
iTunes Store Password Screen displays:
(Left side screen) Virtual Keyboard
(right side) Password entry field & Submit button

title: Scenario: iTunes Login Authentication Failure
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed PGA Tour Live app
AND we have previously registered an PGA Tour Live account
AND we no PGA Tour Live Account is signed in on the ATV
AND we launch PGA Tour Live app and are presented with the access gate
AND we select "Already a subscriber? Sign in."
custom_steps:
WHEN presented with the iTunes Sign in screen
A. AND we enter invalid Apple ID credentials (ID or password)


B. AND if we attempt to sign in more than 5x with invalid credentials
custom_expected:
A. THEN a Login Error *Screen (or message) will appear
AND a message regarding 'Invalid email or password' will be stated
AND all formatting and text will be readable
*AND a CANCEL button will be present

*B. THEN we will be locked out of sign in attempts/the app for 30 minutes



*needs confirmation

title: Scenario: User restores purchase
custom_preconds: Given a user buys the application through in-app purchase
custom_steps:
When the user has installed the application
And the user launches the application
And accesses the pay wall
And selects the 'Already Purchased?' Restore button
custom_expected:
Then the user is prompted to enter their iTunes credentials
And upon entering the credentials that were previously used for In-App Purchase the user will be granted access
And selects any paid features will give the user access

title: Scenario: User restores purchase on secondary device
custom_preconds: Given a user buys the application through in-app purchase
custom_steps: When the user attempts to restore their purchase on a secondary device
custom_expected:
Then the user is prompted to enter their iTunes credentials
And upon entering the credentials that were previously used for In-App Purchase the user will be granted access
And selecting any paid features will give the user access

title: More: Verify categories displayed in More tab when an account is linked to the app
custom_preconds:
Given the PGA Tour Live channel is accessed
And the device is activated with a valid account
custom_steps: When the Settings menu is activated
custom_expected:
Then the following categories are displayed in the Settings menu: 

Sign Out
About PGA TOUR LIVE
Terms of Use
Privacy Policy

title: Scenario: PGA Tour Live ID sign in
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed PGA Tour Live app
AND we have previously registered an PGA Tour Live account
AND we no PGA Tour Live Account is signed in on the ATV
AND we launch PGA Tour Live app and are presented with the access gate
AND we select "Already a subscriber? Sign in."
custom_steps:
WHEN presented with the PGA Tour Live Sign in options screen
AND we select "Sign-in with my PGA Tour Live user information" button
custom_expected:
PGA Tour Live ID entry  Screen displays:
(Left side screen) Virtual Keyboard
(right side) HBO NOW ID entry field & Submit button

title: Scenario: PGA Tour Live Password entry
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed PGA Tour Live app
AND we have previously registered an PGA Tour Live account
AND we no PGA Tour Live is signed in on the ATV
AND we launch PGA Tour Live app and are presented with the access gate
AND we select "Already a subscriber? Sign in."
custom_steps:
WHEN presented with the PGA Tour Live Sign in options screen
AND we select "Sign-in with my PGA Tour Live user information" button
AND we have entered and submitted a valid PGA Tour Live ID on the ID sign in screen
custom_expected:
PGA Tour Live PASSWORD entry Screen displays:
(Left side screen) Virtual Keyboard
(right side) PGA Tour Live PASSWORD entry field & Submit button

title: Scenario: PGA Tour Live Login Authentication Failure
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed PGA Tour Live app
AND we have previously registered an PGA Tour Live account
AND we no PGA Tour Live is signed in on the ATV
AND we launch PGA Tour Live app and are presented with the access gate
AND we select "Already a subscriber? Sign in."
custom_steps:
WHEN presented with the PGA Tour Live Sign in options screen
AND we select "Sign-in with my PGA Tour Live user information" button
A. WHEN we enter invalid PGA Tour Live credentials (ID or password)

B. AND if we attempt to sign in more than 5x with invalid credentials
custom_expected:
A. THEN a Login Error *Screen (or message) will appear
AND a message regarding 'Invalid email or password' will be stated
AND all formatting and text will be readable
*AND a CANCEL button will be present

B. THEN we will be locked out of sign in attempts/the app for 30 minutes
AND a message will display directing the user how to change/update password if they wish to do so before the 30 minutes has passed.

CONTINUE button: selected, will return to the Walled Garden

*needs confirmation

title: Scenario: Subscription Service Unavailable Registration Error with Active subscription
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed PGA Tour Live app
AND we have previously registered an PGA Tour Live account
AND we no PGA Tour Live is signed in on the ATV
AND we launch PGA Tour Live app
AND we navigate to the log in screen in the More Tab
custom_steps: WHEN we Sign in with an Active subscription account but iTunes is unreachable
custom_expected:
THEN a Message displays with explanation text...
“Please try again shortly.”

title: Scenario: User that purchases PGA Tour Live through IAP on 'Device A (ATV)' attempts to access PGA Tour Live on 'Device B (ATV)' by logging in with a linked account
custom_preconds:
Given a user buys the application through in-app purchase
And the user links it to an PGA Tour Live web account without previous entitlement
custom_steps: When the user attempts to user their linked account on a second device
custom_expected: Then upon successful login all entitled features should be unlocked

title: About: Legible Format and Text
Terms of Use: Legible Format and Text
Policy: Legible Format and Text
Recover: Select this will bring the user to the Recover Password Screen
Recover: Entering an invalid email will bring up a message telling the user that it is an invalid email.
Recover: Entering a valid email will bring the user to a message screen instructing that an email as sent
Recover: Completing the recover password flow in the app will give the user an email with a temporary password

title: Scenario: Lapse in Billing Registration Error (Active subscription sign in)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed PGA Tour Live app
AND we have previously registered an PGA Tour Live account
AND we no PGA Tour Live Account is signed in on the ATV
AND we launch PGA Tour Live app and are presented with the access gate
AND we select "Already a subscriber? Sign in."
AND we select "￼Purchased PGA tour Live through a TV/Internet/Mobile Provider" button
custom_steps: WHEN we Sign in with an Active subscription account but there has been a lapse in billing.
custom_expected: Guides user to FAQ with instructions on how to resolve via iTunes.

title: iTunes Password screen: Verify selecting Submit button opens the PGA Tour Live Registration screen (if AppleID not previously signed in)
custom_preconds:
PGA Tour Live has been downloaded to ATV 
AND launched from the ATV menu
AND no PGA Tour Live user is signed in
AND user has Selected Subscribe from Welcome screen
And user has submitted a valid apple ID (email)
custom_steps:
1. Enter valid AppleID password
2. select "Submit"
custom_expected:
PGA Tour Live registration Screen displays:
(Left side screen) Virtual Keyboard
(right side) Apple ID is auto filled in Email field 
(right side) Submit button

AND Apple ID user is signed in
custom_steps: Select the Subscribe button
custom_expected:

(right side) Email field *(w/ Apple ID autofilled) & Submit button

*TBD?: AppleID must be used, otherwise confirmation email with linking instructions will not be received and account cannot be recovered.

title: PGA Tour Live user registration: Verify selecting the Submit button opens the PGA Tour Live TOU & PP agreement
custom_preconds:
PGA Tour Live has been downloaded to ATV 
AND launched from the ATV menu
AND no PGA Tour Live user is signed in
AND Apple ID user is signed in
custom_steps:
On The PGA Tour Live User registration page, with Apple Id filled in the email entry field,
Select the Submit button
custom_expected:
Terms of Use and Privacy Policy screen displays with the following elements:
 - TOU & PP Header and Text: Header is centered above text window and text is contained within the scrollable window
 - Agree (button)
 - Disagree (button)

All text is clear and readable

title: Terms & Privacy Screen: Verify selecting the Agree button on the TOU and PP screen opens the Confirm Subscription screen
custom_preconds:
PGA Tour Live has been downloaded to ATV 
AND has progressed through the In app purchase flow to the PGA Tour Live user registration
custom_steps: At the Terms of use and Privacy policy screen select "AGREE" button.
custom_expected:
The Subscription Confirmation screen displays:
 - Confirmation message 
 - Subscribe (button)
 - Cancel (button)
 - Help text/url

title: Terms & Privacy Screen: Verify selecting the Disagree button on the TOU and PP screen returns the user to the Welcome Screen (access gate)
custom_preconds:
PGA Tour Live has been downloaded to ATV 
AND has progressed through the In app purchase flow to the PGA Tour Live user registration
custom_steps: At the Terms of use and Privacy policy screen select "DISAGREE" button.
custom_expected:
The user is returned back to the Welcome Screen, with the three options:

1.  Sign up (to purchase using an iTunes account + free trial (if eligible))

2.  Sign in to existing HBO NOW account (or MVPD)

3.  Sign in (restore an existing iTunes account)

title: Confirm Subscription: Verify selecting the CANCEL button on Confirm Subscription screen returns the user to the Welcome Screen (access gate)
custom_preconds:
PGA Tour Live has been downloaded to ATV 
AND has progressed through the In app purchase flow to the PGA Tour Live user registration
AND TOU & PP have been accepted
custom_steps: At Subscription Confirmation screen select "CANCEL" button.
custom_expected:
The user is returned back to the Welcome Screen, with the three options:

1.  Sign up (to purchase using an iTunes account + free trial (if eligible))

2.  Sign in to existing PGA Tour Live account (or MVPD)

3.  Sign in (restore an existing iTunes account)

title: Confirm Subscription: Verify selecting the SUBSCRIBE button on Confirm Subscription screen takes user to PGA Tour Live Home screen
custom_preconds:
PGA Tour Live has been downloaded to ATV 
AND has progressed through the In app purchase flow to the PGA Tour Live user registration
AND TOU & PP have been accepted
custom_steps: At Subscription Confirmation screen select "SUBSCRIBE" button.
custom_expected:
THEN the user will be brought to the Home Screen
AND the Home screen should display featured assets:
+

AND no Continue Watching asset is listed
AND the assets are able to be scrolled through
AND the assets are selectable/playable
